name: test_e2e_with_logs[513_REDIR_CREDS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `REDIR_CREDS_001` |
| **Name** | Credential in URL redirect |
| **Category** | OPEN_REDIRECT |
| **Subcategory** | credential_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `redirect=http://good.com@evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `redirect%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fgood.com%40evil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~16000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:43.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected test_id=REDIR_CREDS_001-1772277103931-tpiy2 pattern_id=REDIR_CREDS_001 uri=/?q=redirect%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fgood.com%40evil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected test_id=REDIR_CREDS_001-1772277103931-tpiy2 pattern_id=REDIR_CREDS_001 uri=/?q=redirect%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fgood.com%40evil.com client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
11:11:43.000000000: Warning [NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected test_id=REDIR_CREDS_001-1772277103931-tpiy2 pattern_id=REDIR_CREDS_001 uri=/?q=redirect%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fgood.com%40evil.com client=127.0.0.1
```
